alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 7:03AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 1015 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 701 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over portions of windward Oahu between Kaneohe Marine Corp base and Kahuku. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour in spots. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Punaluu, Kaaawa, Waikane, Hauula, Waiahole, Laie, Kahaluu, Ahuimanu, Kahuku, Kaneohe, Kahana Valley State Park, Kualoa, Malaekahana State Park, Waimea Valley, Heeia and Pupukea. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 1015 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
